# sec_protocol_challenge_t | Apple Developer Documentation

- [ Security ](/documentation/security)

- [ sec_protocol_challenge_t ](/documentation/security/sec_protocol_challenge_t)

-  sec_protocol_challenge_t 

Type Alias# sec_protocol_challenge_t

iOS 2.0+iPadOS 2.0+Mac Catalyst 13.0+macOS 10.0+tvOS 9.0+visionOS 1.0+watchOS 2.0+

```
typealias sec_protocol_challenge_t = (
    sec_protocol_metadata_t,
    @escaping sec_protocol_challenge_complete_t
) -> Void
```

## [ Parameters ](/documentation/security/sec_protocol_challenge_t#parameters)

`metadata`A `sec_protocol_metadata_t` instance.

`complete`A `sec_protocol_challenge_complete_t` to be invoked when the challenge is complete.

## [Discussion](/documentation/security/sec_protocol_challenge_t#discussion)

Block to be invoked when the protocol instance is issued a challenge (e.g., a TLS certificate request).
